Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Lake
B. Sea
C. River
D. Pool
E. Pond
Solution: All except River contain stagnant water.

Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Cow
B. Deer
C. Donkey
D. Rhinoceros
E. Goat

In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Rose
B. Lotus
C. Marigold
D. Lily
E. Tulip
Solution: All except Lotus are flowers which grow on land, while lotus grows in water.

Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Metre
B. Furlong
C. Yard
D. Mile
E. Acre
Solution: All except Acre are units of measuring distance, while acre is a unit of area.

Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Snore
B. Slumber
C. Yawn
D. Doze
E. Dream
Solution: All except Yawn are actions in sleep, while yawn is a form of boredom.
